alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Jeff Davis; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 10:10AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Pierce, central Bacon, northwestern Wayne, Jeff Davis and Appling Counties through 1045 AM EDT... At 1010 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hazlehurst to 7 miles northwest of Bristol. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baxley, Hazlehurst, Alma, Graham, Surrency, Plant Hatch, Odum, Denton, New Lacy and Pine Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Bacon; Jeff Davis; Pierce; Wayne
